channel.title: Wallets on Particl Project Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Wallets on Particl Project Wiki

item.title: Particl Desktop
item.description: Particl Desktop is Particl’s flagship client/wallet for interacting with PART network, including Particl Open Marketplace. For latest development set up info check official repo of Particl Desktop (on dev branch) Contribute Join us in #particl-dev:matrix.org on Element (formerly Riot) for more info and/or assistance. Keep in mind that the development currently happens on a private fork of this repo. Requirements Node.jsÂ® v10 git yarn Installation Clone the repo & fetch dependencies:

item.title: Trezor wallet
item.description: Requirements Build instructions Update bootloader Trezor One firmware Trezor T firmware Emulator support Initializing the device through trezorctl Troubleshooting Can’t find the device? What if I bricked my device somehow? Requirements Python 3.6+ (verify this by doing python3 --version) Docker (Trezor python package) Protocol Buffers (protoc) Build instructions Plug in the Trezor. Clone Particl’s Trezor firmware repository: We also need to fetch the corresponding submodules.
